Maza64 and for everybody that are having this type of problem:
1.Install game
2.Launch game(leave empty activation code and press ok), game will download and install patch.
3.replace paul.dll in bin folder with skidrow one.
4.Play game
4.install skidrow patch if game doesnt want to start.

PS. paul.dll can be seen as virus so your windows or antivirus can put it in quarantine, so disable security and allow that file to be used, and do not replace paul.dll before installation of patches!

For the people that are wondering if it works for the ENG/PL version, yes it works. I had an error saying the game was incomplete while the update was running which made it stop everytime. 

All of a sudden it decided to not stop promptly while updating. And everything worked fine after.

My steps : 

1. Installed the game, after it was done a window popped up. Closed it by clicking the cross in the upper right corner.

2. Started the Game/Launcher, waited till the update was finished.

3. After the update the same window from before popped up but this time I clicked accept in the bottom right corner.

4. Started the Game/Launcher to see what message I would get. An activation screen popped up in which you could insert information etc.

5. Well that's not good so then I copied the cracked paul.dll to the bin folder in the witcher 2 directory which replaced the existing one.

6. Started the Game/Launcher and what do you know, it worked and my fun time could start.

This game is awesome and I'm buying it soon because they deserve it for making such a great game.

Works with the ENG/PL.

1. Install
--------------------------------------------------------
2. DONT TOUCH ANYTHING, DONT CRACK THE GAME!!!
--------------------------------------------------------
3. Run the launcher, click 'activate' with blank field.
4. Let the launcher download patch.
5. Try to launch the game once more. If you didn't screw up you should see much bigger window with serial. Close that window and launcher.
6. Finally crack the game.
7. Run it and have fun.

OK, another advice for you, guys. Same as upper - I'm writing it on my own, so I know it's working.

PROBLEM:
-you can't even see/find the cracked paul.dll but you are sure that it has downloaded properly,
-you get an annoying error message with 'admin rights' while copying the cracked dll

SOLUTION:
Turn off the antivirus (if u can't then disactivate real time defenders/agents etc - it might require a reboot), because it has already blocked the cracked paul.dll and probably put it into quarantine...

If you get any other error messages that means you haven't cracked the game properly...

To install the patch 1.2, you have to delete installed dlc's located at CookedPC (alchemy_suit,swordsman_suit,roche_jacket,troll,arena,magical_suit and merchant.dzip or .dlc). You might want to back these up, but patch installs all of them anyway.
